document.full_text: arsenal's 1-0 victory over manchester united on sunday in london will rank as a nice parting gift in its (most likely failed) premier league title chase. but chelsea's fans must have been cheering, too.
document.title: arsenal took the points, but chelsea won, too
lines_and_colors: arsenal's 1-0 victory over manchester united on sunday in london will rank as a nice parting gift in its (most likely failed) premier league title chase. but chelsea's fans must have been cheering, too.
